job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen, uitbreiden en verbeteren van (virtuele) ETL jobs en data modellen. Dit voor complexe data extracten, transformaties en preparatie processen in het AAV Data Analytisch Platform.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the development and improvement of ETL jobs and data models, which are core software development tasks for data pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Coachen van Data Engineers in de Data Squads en in het Data Beheer team
job_tasks.justification: Coaching is a form of technical leadership and knowledge sharing within a software engineering context.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met Data Engineers op het gebied van data modellering, data oplossingen bedenken en root-cause analyses uitvoeren
job_tasks.justification: This involves collaborative problem-solving and design within the software engineering domain, specifically around data solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: adviseer je in de rol van data architect organisatie breed over hoe we data en AI technologie zo optimaal mogelijk kunnen integreren in ons landschap.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand the business context and advise on the strategic integration of technology.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen met de AAV Enterprise Architect richting geven aan de verdere implementatie van onze strategie op basis van o.a. de data productvisie, de kaders en principes van data architectuur als ook de brede Enterprise architectuur
job_tasks.justification: This task involves aligning technical strategy with business strategy and architectural principles.

job_tasks.phrase: Afstemmen met stakeholders en zo zeker stellen dat onze data producten ook aansluiten binnen de architectuur van ons moederbedrijf, Nationale Nederlanden
job_tasks.justification: This involves stakeholder management and ensuring alignment with broader business and enterprise architecture.

job_tasks.phrase: Als AAV stimuleren wij onze medewerkers om iedere dag het beste uit zichzelf te halen. En om het initiatief en de verantwoordelijkheid te nemen in het continu verbeteren van onze dienstverlening.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase speaks to a general drive for continuous improvement and taking initiative, which is a core aspect of software engineering roles focused on delivery and quality.

soft_skills.phrase: werk je nauw samen met de Data Engineers die in onze Data Squads nieuwe en complexe data preparaties ontwerpen en realiseren.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights close collaboration with other engineers.

soft_skills.phrase: Coachen van Data Engineers in de Data Squads en in het Data Beheer team
soft_skills.justification: Coaching implies communication and knowledge sharing.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met Data Engineers op het gebied van data modellering, data oplossingen bedenken en root-cause analyses uitvoeren
soft_skills.justification: Directly mentions collaboration on technical tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: adviseer je in de rol van data architect organisatie breed over hoe we data en AI technologie zo optimaal mogelijk kunnen integreren in ons landschap.
soft_skills.justification: Advising the organization implies communication and influencing.

soft_skills.phrase: Samen met de AAV Enterprise Architect richting geven aan de verdere implementatie van onze strategie
soft_skills.justification: Working with an Enterprise Architect to guide strategy involves significant collaboration and communication.
Directly refers to communication and alignment with stakeholders.

soft_skills.phrase: Als AAV stimuleren wij onze medewerkers om iedere dag het beste uit zichzelf te halen. En om het initiatief en de verantwoordelijkheid te nemen in het continu verbeteren van onze dienstverlening.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes taking initiative and responsibility, which aligns with innovation and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: transformasie naar een digitale en data gedreven schadeverzekeraar en intermediair.
soft_skills.justification: The role is part of a transformation, implying a need for adaptability and learning new ways of working.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional data engineering tasks such as developing ETL jobs, data models, and data preparation using tools like Denodo, Azure SQL, ADF, and Databricks. While AI technology is mentioned in the context of integration and strategy, there are no specific tasks related to developing, fine-tuning, or implementing AI/ML models themselves. The role is primarily about building and managing data infrastructure and pipelines, which falls under Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering). Therefore, the profile is 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job description is very clear about the core responsibilities being data engineering and architecture, with no explicit mention of AI/ML model development or specialized GenAI tasks. The technologies listed are standard data engineering tools. The role's focus is on data preparation and integration within a broader digital transformation, fitting the 'Software Engineer' profile well.
